body:
Is it dumb and full of shit or a harsh truth that makes you angry? A lot of people tend to knee-jerk denounce something if it's uncomfortable for them. However it has been my experience that talented people can be lazy and get to an insane level, while others work their tail off for years and still get mediocre results. Do you deny the existence of people with retardation disorders? Can you seriously expect an ant to become as smart as a person by sheer will? No you can't. Nurture helps but it still depends on nature. It makes perfect sense biologically, everyone serves a different task in a tribe or society and is optimized for that role. The problem is, this is outdated now. Less than 200 years ago, you carried on your family legacy because that's what you were good at, whether you liked it or not. Some families farmed, because that's what they were good at. Some families entered trades they were good at. Others ran business or became politicians and lawyers, because they were good at that. Men did physical labor and fighting, or less often leading, because that's what they were good at. Women did intellectual and creative things, and raised children, because that's what they were good at. People are social animals, and you are optimized to serve your tribe above all else. So each person is specialized for certain tasks, and other functions are nerfed because they get in the way of the role they're suppose to do. They are also hierarchical by nature, so some will naturally be at the top and capable of more things, while the commoners are more limited and simple. Now we have more time to ourselves to explore passions, but our brains are still hardwired by survival instincts to say "no" and prep us for a specialized function to benefit the tribe. So those who inherited from the elites or those matching their interests have no issues, but those who didn't are forever stuck battling against how they're wired at a fundamental level.

Take me for example. I am a young male whose family has a history of being simple people, mostly farmers and stereotypical workers. And that's fine. But I inherited the optimization for that, and go figure, I am into creating things, programming, storytelling, being funny, drawing, learning, inventing, innovating, imagining things, etc. Of course I struggle to even get acceptable results because my brain is locked in on my biological specialty. Meanwhile others easily do 100x as much as me, and at a level that seems almost faultless from my point of view. They are optimized for those tasks, but I am not, so my ability to do them is blocked so not to get in the way of what I'm biologically primed to do, while theirs is continually strengthened. Indeed, I actually get worse as time goes on, as my development pushes me more towards my biological function and discards everything else as unnecessary.

It's time to stop pretending anyone can do anything and accept that genes and luck play a major role in our lives. Genes even determine up to 80% of how happy you are. Which also makes sense, because some tasks (ie fighting) are better when a person is angry or unhappy. Others are best when the person is happy. As a social animal, your genes don't give a flying fuck about you, they only care about the tribe, and you only matter as far as you will benefit it. It's literally fucking communism. You don't matter or have any say in your life, only the mythological "collective" matters as far as your biology is concerned. This world is a total crap shot.

The truth hurts. Keep taking blue pills if you want, actually I'd advise you to since it's the only way to cope with all this bullshit that is reality. But unfortunately they stopped working on me.

Conservative news, commentary, memes, and organizing information.

The term "conservative" comes from the Latin verb for "to conserve or preserve," and reflects the nature of conservatives as those who seek to preserve the best of human endeavor and nature throughout all of history, measuring it qualitatively to achieve excellence (*arete*) in defiance of the human tendency toward solipsism (*hubris*).

We include all conservatives from Republicans, paleoconservatives, monarchists, anarcho-monarchists, traditionalists, Nietzscheans, crunchy conservatives, Alt-Right, Ult Right, neoreactionaries, and social conservatives onward. No socialism or egalitarianism please.

parent.body:
We changed because we woke up. None of the things you listed can happen in a multi-cultural  and multi-ethnic society. Different peoples have different inherit values. The founding stock of the US (from North and West Europe) had a strong culture of individuality and self-reliance. Many of us have come to the realization that culture doesn't spring from the dirt but from the peoples that harbor it. Living on a patch of ground doesn't make your values change. If your people are the kind that desire a strong government and leaders then that's what you'll vote for in a democracy. If your people wish to elevate themselves above others then that's what you'll vote for. This has been shown time and again through election results. The unwritten rules of society govern as much as the written ones, take freedom of speech for example if the government can't censor your speech but private business can then the only thing keeping those businesses from censoring you is the inherit culture that values that freedom. When that freedom takes a back seat to other ethnic concerns, like erasing Whiteness, then you have moved outside the culture. 

There is a reason successful democracies have only occurred in European and European diaspora nations.

post.body:
I don't know what's going on in the past year or so, perhaps a reaction to the riots this summer and all the shit going on in recent months. But look at Joe Biden 40 years ago and all the "old Democrats" who were leftists with right-wing cultural beliefs and most of you sound exactly like them now.

What's happened is you abandoned freedom. What happened to small government, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, and the constitution? It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

Edit: See, this is another example of their censorship, the [+"Conservative"](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative) guild kicked this post because it doesn't support their new alt ideology, even though it's in line with actual conservatism.

body:
> Since we decided that being attacked for being White was wrong.

That's *anti* identity politics. That means racism against white people is wrong. It doesn't mean all non-whites are batshit crazy lefties just because the media hates on whites, but you seem to think that now. You used to complain about how the left reacted to racism with reverse racism, which made perfect sense, but now you're reacting yourself with reverse reverse racism?

> You apparently missed the part I wrote about freedom being impossible in a multi-cultural and multi-ethnic society. The left has created a coalition of anti-White racialists whose goal it is to make White people second class citizens in the lands their ancestors conquered. They have preyed upon our idealism to force themselves into positions of power to accomplish this goal.

You seem like you need to be reminded that 99.99999% of those radical white-bashing leftists are white SJWs or CEOs.

> So now we set aside our ideals to deal with the reality.

I'm sorry, but that's just wrong and hypocritical. That gives me the impression that you don't actually care about your ideals unless it's about you.

You apparently missed the part I wrote about freedom being impossible in a multi-cultural and multi-ethnic society. The left has created a coalition of anti-White racialists whose goal it is to make White people second class citizens in the lands their ancestors conquered. They have preyed upon our idealism to force themselves into positions of power to accomplish this goal.

You seem like you need to be reminded that 99.99999% of those radical white-bashing leftists are white SJWs or CEOs.

So now we set aside our ideals to deal with the reality.

I'm sorry, but that's just wrong and hypocritical. That gives me the impression that you don't actually care about your ideals unless it's about you.

post.body:
I don't know what's going on in the past year or so, perhaps a reaction to the riots this summer and all the shit going on in recent months. But look at Joe Biden 40 years ago and all the "old Democrats" who were leftists with right-wing cultural beliefs and most of you sound exactly like them now.

What's happened is you abandoned freedom. What happened to small government, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, and the constitution? It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

Edit: See, this is another example of their censorship, the [+"Conservative"](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative) guild kicked this post because it doesn't support their new alt ideology, even though it's in line with actual conservatism.

post.body:
I don't know what's going on in the past year or so, perhaps a reaction to the riots this summer and all the shit going on in recent months. But look at Joe Biden 40 years ago and all the "old Democrats" who were leftists with right-wing cultural beliefs and most of you sound exactly like them now.

What's happened is you abandoned freedom. What happened to small government, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, and the constitution? It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

Edit: See, this is another example of their censorship, the [+"Conservative"](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative) guild kicked this post because it doesn't support their new alt ideology, even though it's in line with actual conservatism.

It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?
